title: Programming Assignment 1: Variables and Data Types
description: Complete exercises on variables, data types, and basic operations in Python.

title: Lab Exercise: Control Flow
description: Implement loops and conditional statements to solve programming challenges.

title: Homework Set 5: Integration Techniques
description: Solve problems on integration by parts and trigonometric substitution.

title: Quiz 3: Derivatives and Applications
description: In-class quiz covering derivative rules and related rates.

title: Essay: The Industrial Revolution
description: Write a 5-page essay analyzing the social and economic impacts of the Industrial Revolution.

title: Reading Response: Chapter 8
description: Write a one-page response to the assigned chapter reading.

title: Midterm Exam Prep
description: Review chapters 1-5 and complete practice problems for the midterm exam.

title: Research Paper Outline
description: Submit detailed outline for research paper on cognitive development.

title: Literary Analysis: Shakespeare's Sonnets
description: Analyze themes and literary devices in selected Shakespeare sonnets.

title: Discussion Post: Romanticism
description: Post your thoughts on Romantic literature and respond to two classmates.

title: Midterm Project Proposal
description: Submit a proposal for your midterm programming project.

title: Homework Set 6: Series Convergence
description: Complete problems on series convergence tests and applications.
